data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I2RCNR0_glsQ7kNvgFbxiBJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBdp-cm0zSz_x4cGekYPIHYe8_vBQBjKesxhZ74OxI5UQ&oe=66CEE5CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2S9fz-TgkAQQ7kNvgH1m8hl&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDS1z4fXiDfnuCGC7N-CFOm-e_pX-h9iTxQARGKD4JOjg&oe=66CF1C1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vQrp7rlWmnEQ7kNvgFZvHcD&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC894jmZcRL6eB2bohAOZJr_izwCmLJgC1MdPncHcMMdw&oe=66CF0171)
